attributes.action: I would like to petitiion on gas training
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Action should be taken against private companys,that make profit out of Gas training.(ie Trainning centres and) collages
It should be free and run at no profit and allow plumbers to get training, and update their qualifications and take in to account their expereince when they apply. (Ps I hope you can now understand  what is requested by you
